participant_1.background:
I'm a proud dog dad to my two puppies.
i live in nashville.
i always travel alone.
My job is to explore the world and share my adventures with others.
My wife is a stay-at-home mom and my kids are all in school.

participant_2.background:
I love Halloween because it's a time to be creative and have fun.
I met a lot of new people at the welding classes I've been taking.
my favorite band is bon over.
I'm not rich, but I think it would be fun to try my luck at horse racing.
I love to spend my time listening to Katy Perry while I track my bets.

content.text: Hey there! How is your day going?
Hello! It's going great thanks! How about you?
I'm doing well too! I'm just getting ready to head out the door to go to work.
Oh nice! What do you do for work?
I'm an explorer! I travel all over the world and share my adventures with others.
That sounds so awesome! I've always wanted to travel the world.
It's definitely a lot of fun! I get to see all sorts of amazing places and meet new people.
That's awesome! I'm sure your job is really rewarding.
Yeah, it is! I love getting to share my adventures with others.
I bet! It sounds like you have a really cool job.
Thanks! I'm glad you think so!
I'm sure you've had some amazing adventures so far!
Oh yeah, I have! I've been to all sorts of amazing places like Machu Picchu, the Great Wall of China, and the Taj Mahal.
Wow! Those are all amazing places to visit! I've always wanted to see Machu Picchu.
It's absolutely beautiful! I would highly recommend it.
I will definitely have to put that on my bucket list!
You should! It's definitely worth it.
No problem! I'm always happy to help people plan their travels.
